No, don't call me a hero. Do you know who the real heroes are? The guys who wake up every morning and go into their normal jobs, and get a distress call from the Commissioner and take off their glasses and change into capes and fly around fighting crime. Those are the real heroes.
Excuse me, I'm sorry, but that's not all it takes to be a hero.
Sorry, can't understand you
Please give me more info
Not sure I understand
Yes

I'm your man.
Okay, okay, okay, okay.
I think I got this.
I understand.
I can handle that.
Well, it should be.

No.
Yes I do.

Yes you did.

Yes! Yeah! Yeah! Okay! Yes!
Yes! Yeah! Yeah! Okay!
Yes! It's a Christmas Miracle!
Yeah! Whoo-Hoo!
Whoo hoo HOO hoo hoo!
I don't believe you, continue.
I'm sorry.
It's not fair.
Damnit!
I know it was you. Fine. You know what? I'll have to interview each and every one of you until the perpetrator makes him or herself known.
It's always you.

You have never been cooler.
Okay, great. Seriously? Now you believe in my traditions, when some democrat looks it up on wikipedia?
Retaliation.

Come on, get with the spirit of it.
Michael always says, 'K-I-S-S, keep it simple, stupid.' Great advice, hurts my feelings every time.
I decided earlier.
D.W.I.G.H.T - Determined, Worker, Intense, Good worker, Hard worker, Terrific.
Dwight Schrute. My father's name, also Dwight Schrute. My grandfather's name, Dweide Schrude, Amish. That's my family. I don't know where they came, the Amish, came from originally. Uh, Amland.
Dwight Schrute, Assistant Regional Manager.

I saw Wedding Crashers accidentally. I bought a ticket for "Grizzly Man" and went into the wrong theater. After an hour, I figured I was in the wrong theater, but I kept waiting. Cuz that's the thing about bear attacks... they come when you least expect it.
I do not fear the unknown. I will meet my new challenges head-on, and I will succeed, and I will laugh in the faces of those who doubt me.
I don't have a lot of experience with vampires, but I have hunted werewolves. I shot one once, but by the time I got to it, it had turned back into my neighbor's dog.

When I die, I want to be frozen. And if they have to freeze me in pieces, so be it. I will wake up stronger than ever, because I will have used that time, to figure out exactly why I died. And what moves I could have used to defend myself better now that I know what hold he had me in.
I will travel to New Zealand. And walk the Lord of the Rings trail to Mordor.
I am fast. To give you a reference point I am somewhere between a snake and a mongoose... And a panther.
Nothing stresses me out. Except having to seek the approval of my inferiors.
Through concentration, I can raise and lower my cholesterol at will.

As a volunteer Sheriff's Deputy I've been doing surveillance for years. One time I suspected an ex-girlfriend of mine of cheating on me, so I tailed her for six nights straight. Turns out... she was. With a couple of guys actually, so... mystery solved.
I did not become a Lackawanna County volunteer sheriff's deputy to make friends. And by the way, I haven't.
Fortunately, my feelings regenerate at twice the speed of a normal man's.
My perfect Valentine's day? I'm at home, three cell phones in front of me, fielding desperate calls from people who want to buy one of the fifty restaurant reservations I made over six months ago.
When someone smiles at me, all I see is a chimpanzee begging for its life.
I am ready to face any challenge that might be foolish enough to face me.
In an ideal world I would have all ten fingers on my left hand and the right one would just be left for punching.
And I misspelled, in front of the entire school, the word 'failure'.
I've achieved plenty, and there's no better than the best.
The Schrutes have a word for when everything in a man's life comes together perfectly. Perfectenschlag. Right now, I am in it.
I really should have a Tweeter account.
I'm Assistant Regional Manager. I should know first.
Never been sick. Perfect immune system.
I'm a deer hunter. I go all the time with my dad. One thing about deer, they have very good vision. One thing about me, I am better at hiding than they are... at vision.

I don't have a lot of experience with vampires, but I have hunted werewolves. I shot one once, but by the time I got to it, it had turned back into my neighbor's dog.

As a volunteer Sheriff's Deputy I've been doing surveillance for years. One time I suspected an ex-girlfriend of mine of cheating on me, so I tailed her for six nights straight. Turns out... she was. With a couple of guys actually, so... mystery solved.
Every year, my grandfather would dress up as belsnickel at Christmas. He was...okay at it. I am great. You know how they say some people were born to be bad? Well, I was born to be belsnickel.
Of course Martial Arts training is relevant!
I'm not sure what you're talking about.
Thank you. Thank you very much.
Thanks

Then ask me to tell you a joke.
Downsizing? I have no problem with that. I have been recommending downsizing since I first got here. I even brought it up in my interview. I say, bring it on.
OK, first, let's go over some parameters. How many people can I fire?
Hey you know what's even cooler than Triceratops? Every other dinosaur that ever existed!

Security in this office park is a joke. Last year I came to work with my spud-gun in a duffel bag. I sat at my desk all day with a rifle that shoots potatoes at 60 pounds per square inch. Can you imagine if I was deranged?
I am not a security threat. And my middle name is Kurt, not fart.
Always the padawan, never the jedi.
I am a Sith Lord.
Smoking is gonna save lives.
Powerpoints are the peacocks of the business world; all show, no meat.
All you need is love? False. The four basic human necessities are air, water, food and shelter.
A hero is part-human and part-supernatural. A hero is born out of a childhood trauma, or out of a disaster that must be avenged.
I have a story that will make you feel better. When I was young, I misspelled, in front of the entire school, the word failure.
I wonder if king-sized sheets are called presidential-sized in England.
Bears, Beets, Battlestar Galactica. People find this funny, but I'm not sure why.
Bread is the paper of the food industry. You write your sandwich on it.

Dolphins get a lot of good publicity for the drowning swimmers they push back to shore, but what you don't hear about is the many people they push farther out to sea! Dolphins aren't smart. They just like pushing things.
Studies have shown that more information gets passed through water cooler gossip than through official memos. Which puts me at a disadvantage because I bring my own water to work.
Most people don't even know that a candy cane represents a shepherd's crook. Which I assure you does not taste like peppermint. It tastes like sheep feces.
My perfect Valentine's day? I'm at home, three cell phones in front of me, fielding desperate calls from people who want to buy one of the fifty restaurant reservations I made over six months ago.
I judge your year as...admirable.
Yes. And my decision is final.
Sure.

False.
In the end, the greatest snowball isn't a snowball at all. It's fear.
Those who can't farm, farm celery.
We all have a hero in our heart.
Information is power.

The principle is sound. To avoid illness, expose yourself to germs, enabling your immune system to develop antibodies. I don't know why everyone doesn't do this... Maybe they have something against living forever.
In the wild, there is no healthcare. Healthcare is "Oh, I broke my leg!" A lion comes and eats you, you're dead. Well, I'm not dead, I'm the lion, you're dead!
What's the argument here? NBA, WMBA. One is a sport, one is a joke. I love sports, I love jokes. Room for all.
I'm doing my job.

Why tip someone for a job I'm capable of doing myself? I can deliver food. I can drive a taxi. I can, and do, cut my own hair. I did, however, tip my urologist, because I am unable to pulverize my own kidney stones.
Whenever I'm about to do something, I think, 'would an idiot do that?' and if they would, I do not do that thing.
What was the most inspiring thing I've ever said to you? "Don't be an idiot." Changed my life.
People underestimate the power of nostalgia. Nostalgia is truly one of the greatest human weaknesses, second only to the neck.

There are three things you must never turn your back on: bears, men you have wronged, and a dominant male turkey during mating season.

Would I ever leave this company? Look, I'm all about loyalty. In fact, I feel like part of what I'm being paid for here is my loyalty. But if there were somewhere else that valued loyalty more highly... I'm going wherever they value loyalty the most.

Jim is my enemy. But it turns out that Jim is also his own worst enemy. And the enemy of my enemy is my friend. So, Jim is actually my friend. But, because he is his own worst enemy, the enemy of my friend is my enemy so actually Jim is my enemy.
Jim is gone! He's gone! I miss him so much! I cry myself to sleep! Jim!! False. I do not miss him.
Well, he put my stuff in jello again.
He is the world's best boss. Everybody knows that.
Will I ever get over it? Hmm, no. But, life goes on.
I have decided to shun Andy Bernard for the next three years. Which I'm looking forward to. It's an Amish technique. It's like slapping someone with silence.
Are you trying to hurt my feelings? Because if so, you are succeeding. Fortunately, my feelings regenerate at twice the speed of a normal man.
Don't make me pre-fire you.
Watch this, you're pre-fired. And when I'm promoted, you'll be full-fired.
